#| echo: false
#| results: asis

# Get validation rules for this variable


if (!is.null(var_def$validation)) {
  cat("### Validation Rules\n\n")
  
  # Display validation rules in a table
  validation_rules <- data.frame(
    Rule = names(var_def$validation),
    Value = sapply(var_def$validation, function(x) {
      if (is.list(x)) paste(names(x), x, collapse = ", ") else as.character(x)
    }),
    stringsAsFactors = FALSE
  )
  
  print(kable(validation_rules) |>
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover")))
  
  cat("\n")
}
